Question: This person married his first wife Janet Shearon on January 28, 1956.
Hints: The Justice of the Peace read from an unrepealed 400-year-old law that required him to hang any this person found in the town.
This person announced shortly after the Apollo 11 flight that he did not plan to fly in space again.
The Space Foundation named this person as a recipient of its 2013 General James E Hill Lifetime Space Achievement Award.
